entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2006/10. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population
entry.dcterms:creator: Hegedűs, Péter
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-G58: TÁRKI Omnibus 2006/10. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population. data sheet. Version: 2010-11-23
entry.dcterms:creator: 1 Dencső, Blanka

entry.dcterms:subject: mass political behavior, attitudes
political ideology
society and culture
person
survey data
cross-section

Multi-stage proportionately stratified national probability sample representative of the adult Hungarian population. Respondents were selected using the random walking method out of each strata. Numbers of selected persons are proportional to strata's size
face-to-face interview
